Package com.cafean.client.ui.beans

Interface OptionalPropertyEditor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NamelistEditor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssociatedComponentEditor, CIntegerDropdownEditor, CNamelistDoubleEditor, CNamelistIntegerEditor, CNamelistRealEditor, ExecutableLocationEditor, ModelEnumerationEditor, NamelistBooleanEditor, NamelistDoubleEditor, NamelistFolderSelectionEditor, NamelistIntEditor, NamelistIntSpinnerEditor, NamelistNamedIntEditor, NamelistRealEditor, NamelistStringEditor, OptionalBooleanEditor, OptionalCBooleanEditor, OptionalCDoubleEditor, OptionalCIntegerEditor, OptionalCRealEditor, OptionalCStringEditor, OptionalDoubleEditor, OptionalFolderSelectionEditor, OptionalIdentEditor, OptionalIntegerEditor, OptionalIntSpinnerEditor, OptionalNamedIntEditor, OptionalStringEditor, OptionalSwingFontEditor, SharedBooleanInitialValueEditor, SharedBooleanValueEditor, SharedIntegerInitialValueEditor, SharedIntegerValueEditor, SharedRealInitialValueEditor, SharedRealValueEditor, SharedStringInitialValueEditor, SharedStringValueEditor, SharedValueEditor, SimpleOptionalCRealEditor, SwingFontEditor, TextAreaNonModalEditor
    public interface OptionalPropertyEditor
    An interface describing an editor for a property that conforms to the Optional Property concept in which a property is actually a combination of a value and a boolean activation state.

    Editors of this type assume that the following method is implemented in the object being edited:
    void setPropertyActive( String propertyName )

    See Also:
    PropertyController.isPropertyActive(java.lang.String)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void setContext​(PropertyController owner, java.beans.PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
      Sets the owner and the description of the property currently being edited by this editor.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        void setContext​(PropertyController owner,
                java.beans.PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
        Sets the owner and the description of the property currently being edited by this editor.
        Parameters:
        owner - the PropertyController that owns the property being edited by this editor. This may be null.
        descriptor - a PropertyDescriptor describing the property being edited by this editor.
